nodes.text: DD-11A, or DeDe, was a Tendrando Arms Defender Droid owned by Queen Mother Tenel Ka to protect her daughter, Allana. A modified YVH 1 combat droid, DeDe was made to be a nanny and bodyguard droid for Allana. She had weapon arms, a synthskin torso, and a "cherubic" face.
DeDe helped defend Solo when the Gorog tried to assassinate her.
DeDe was later destroyed after attempting to stop the assassin Aurra Sing from hurting the young Chume'da.
